title: A Developer Health Check on GitHub Copilot and AI Assistants
author: Alexander T Williams
description: We look back on a few years of GitHub Copilot and ask if it's helping or hindering devs. Also, how feasible is it to use Copilot regularly?
cntitle: GitHub Copilot 和 AI 助手开发者健康检查
cndescription: 我们回顾了过去几年 GitHub Copilot 的情况，并探讨它究竟是在帮助还是阻碍开发者。此外，定期使用 Copilot 是否可行？
